name: Word Lite
description: Simple rich text editor with title-aware draft save and txt/html/docx export.

stats.description: Current text stats as { words, chars }

setHtml.description: Replace document with HTML. Params: { html: string }

setTitle.description: Update document title. Params: { title: string }

setText.description: Replace document with plain text. Params: { text: string }

appendText.description: Append plain text as a new paragraph to the document. Params: { text: string }

appendHtml.description: Append HTML content to the end of the document without replacing existing content. Params: { html: string }

saveToStorage.description: Save the current document to YAAR persistent storage. Params: { path: string } ‚Äî e.g. "docs/my-doc.html"

loadFromStorage.description: Load a document from YAAR persistent storage into the editor. Params: { path: string }

newDocument.description: Clear current document to a blank paragraph. Params: {}

saveDraft.description: Save current document to local draft storage. Params: {}
